snippet: Military and medical officials on Monday said that at least 90 soldiers and 28 militants were killed in a battle between Islamist militants and Yemeni troops on Sunday.
abstract: Death toll in the ambush by Al Qaeda militants on a military post in southern Yemen grows to at least 90 soldiers, making it the deadliest attack on the armed forces in the past year.
lead_paragraph: Military and medical officials on Monday said that at least 90 soldiers and 28 militants were killed in a battle between Islamist militants and Yemeni troops on Sunday.

headline.seo: Yemen Death Toll Rises From Qaeda Attack
headline.main: Death Toll Rises in Attack on Yemeni Army Base
headline.print_headline: Toll Rises From a Qaeda Attack on a Yemeni Military Base

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
